bibl.title: Letter from Edwin Anderson Alderman to Emilie Lawrence Reed, February 18, 1931

div1.p: Alderman thanks Emilie Lawrence Reed for her gift of a replica of a Walter Reed bust by Schuler.

div1.head: Letter from Edwin Anderson Alderman to Emilie Lawrence Reed, February 18, 1931
div1.opener:
UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA
CHARLOTTESVILLE
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
My dear Mrs. Reed:
div1.p:
I thank you so much for your
kind letter of February 17th.

We are very happy that we shall
have in our medical library a replica of
the Schuler bust of our greatest alumnus.
I am particularly grateful to General Kean
for the service he so kindly offers us in
bringing this about.
div1.closer:
Faithfully yours, E. A. Alderman
President. Mrs. Walter Reed,
The Burlington Hotel,
Washington, D. C.
February eighteenth,
Nineteen hundred thirty-one.
